meanings.definition: An area of wetland with a deposit of peat.
meanings.sent1: The peatlands provide a unique habitat for many plants and animals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the peatlands to understand their ecological importance.
meanings.sent3: The peatlands decided to throw a party for all the swamp creatures.
meanings.sent4: The peatlands are like a sponge, soaking up water and storing carbon.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the peatlands feels like stepping into a different world.
